   20: 
   21: -module(openssl_session_ticket_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: %% Callback functions
   24: -export([all/0,
   25:          groups/0,
   26:          init_per_suite/1,
   27:          end_per_suite/1,
   28:          init_per_group/2,
   29:          end_per_group/2,
   30:          init_per_testcase/2,
   31:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   32: 
   33: %% Testcases
   34: -export([openssl_server_basic/0,
   35:          openssl_server_basic/1,
   36:          openssl_server_hrr/0,
   37:          openssl_server_hrr/1,
   38:          openssl_server_hrr_multiple_tickets/0,
   39:          openssl_server_hrr_multiple_tickets/1,
   40:          openssl_client_basic/0,
   41:          openssl_client_basic/1,
   42:          openssl_client_hrr/0,
   43:          openssl_client_hrr/1,
   44:          openssl_server_early_data_basic/0,
   45:          openssl_server_early_data_basic/1,
   46:          openssl_server_early_data_big/0,
   47:          openssl_server_early_data_big/1,
   48:          openssl_server_early_data_manual/0,
   49:          openssl_server_early_data_manual/1,
   50:          openssl_server_early_data_manual_big/0,
   51:          openssl_server_early_data_manual_big/1,
   52:          openssl_server_early_data_manual_2_tickets/0,
   53:          openssl_server_early_data_manual_2_tickets/1,
   54:          openssl_server_early_data_manual_2_chacha_tickets/0,
   55:          openssl_server_early_data_manual_2_chacha_tickets/1,
   56:          openssl_client_early_data_basic/0,
   57:          openssl_client_early_data_basic/1]).
   58: 
   59: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   60: -include_lib("ssl/src/tls_handshake.hrl").
   61: 
   62: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   63: 
   64: -define(SLEEP, 500).
   65: 
   66: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   67: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   68: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   69: all() ->
   70:     [
   71:      {group, 'tlsv1.3'}
   72:     ].
   73: 
   74: groups() ->
   75:     [{'tlsv1.3', [], [{group, stateful},
   76:                       {group, stateless},
   77:                       {group, openssl_server},
   78:                       {group, transport_socket}
   79:                      ]},
   80:      {transport_socket, [{group, openssl_server}]},
   81:      {openssl_server, [], [openssl_server_basic,
   82:                            openssl_server_hrr,
   83:                            openssl_server_hrr_multiple_tickets,
   84:                            openssl_server_early_data_basic,
   85:                            openssl_server_early_data_big,
   86:                            openssl_server_early_data_manual,
   87:                            openssl_server_early_data_manual_big,
   88:                            openssl_server_early_data_manual_2_tickets,
   89:                            openssl_server_early_data_manual_2_chacha_tickets
   90:                           ]},
   91:      {stateful, [], session_tests()},
   92:      {stateless, [], session_tests()}].
   93: 
   94: session_tests() ->
   95:     [openssl_client_basic,
   96:      openssl_client_hrr,
   97:      openssl_client_early_data_basic].
   98: 
   99: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  100:     Config = ssl_test_lib:init_per_suite(Config0, openssl),
  101:     ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config).
  102: 
  103: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  104:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_suite(Config).
  105: 
  106: init_per_group(stateful, Config) ->
  107:     [{server_ticket_mode, stateful} | proplists:delete(server_ticket_mode, Config)];
  108: init_per_group(stateless, Config) ->
  109:     [{server_ticket_mode, stateless} | proplists:delete(server_ticket_mode, Config)];
  110: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  111:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group_openssl(GroupName, Config).
  112: 
  113: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  114:   ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  115: 
  116: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  117:     ssl:stop(),
  118:     application:load(ssl),
  119:     ssl:start(),
  120:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 15}),
  121:     Config.
  122: 
  123: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  124:     Config.
  125: 
  126: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  127: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  128: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  129: 
  130: openssl_server_basic() ->
  131:     [{doc,"Test session resumption with session tickets (erlang client - openssl server)"}].
  132: openssl_server_basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  133:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  134:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  135:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  136: 
  137:     %% Configure session tickets
  138:     ClientOpts = [{session_tickets, auto},
  139:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|
  140:                   proplists:delete(versions, ClientOpts0)],
  141: 
  142:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [],
  143:                                        [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  144:     
  145:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  146: 
  147:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  148:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  149:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  150:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  151:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  152:                                                 [false, no_reply]}},
  153:                                          {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts}]),
  154:     %% Wait for session ticket
  155:     ct:sleep(100),
  156: 
  157:     %% Close previous connection as s_server can only handle one at a time
  158:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  159: 
  160:     %% Use ticket
  161:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  162:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  163:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  164:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  165:                                                 [true, no_reply]}},
  166:                                          {from, self()},
  167:                                          {options, ClientOpts}]),
  168:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  169:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
  170: 
  171: openssl_client_basic() ->
  172:     [{doc,"Test session resumption with session tickets (openssl client - erlang server)"}].
  173: openssl_client_basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  174:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  175:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  176: 
  177:     {_, ServerNode, _Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  178:     TicketFile0 = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "session_ticket0"]),
  179:     TicketFile1 = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "session_ticket1"]),
  180:     ServerTicketMode = proplists:get_value(server_ticket_mode, Config),
  181: 
  182:     Data = "Hello world",
  183: 
  184:     %% Configure session tickets
  185:     ServerOpts = [{session_tickets, ServerTicketMode},
  186:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|
  187:                   proplists:delete(versions, ServerOpts0)],
  188:     
  189:     Server0 =
  190: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  191: 				   {from, self()},
  192: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  193:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
  194:                                           [false]}},
  195: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  196: 
  197:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
  198: 
  199:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client(openssl, [{port, Port0}, 
  200:                                                   {options, ClientOpts},
  201:                                                   {session_args, ["-sess_out", TicketFile0]}], Config),
  202: 
  203:     ssl_test_lib:send(Client0, Data),
  204: 
  205:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok),
  206: 
  207:     Server0 ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  208:                                verify_active_session_resumption,
  209:                               [true]}}},
  210:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  211:     %% %% Wait for session ticket
  212:     ct:sleep(100),
  213:     
  214:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client(openssl, [{port, Port0},
  215:                                                   {options, ClientOpts},
  216:                                                   {session_args, ["-sess_in", TicketFile0,
  217:                                                                   "-sess_out", TicketFile1]}], Config),
  218:     
  219: 
  220:     ssl_test_lib:send(Client1, Data),
  221:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok),
  222:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0),    
  223:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
  224: 
  225: openssl_server_hrr() ->
  226:     [{doc,"Test session resumption with session tickets and hello_retry_request (erlang client - openssl server)"}].
  227: openssl_server_hrr(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  228:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  229:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  230:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  231: 
  232:     %% Configure session tickets
  233:     ClientOpts = [{session_tickets, auto},
  234:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
  235:                   {supported_groups,[secp256r1, x25519]}|
  236:                   proplists:delete(versions, ClientOpts0)],
  237: 
  238:     
  239:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [{groups, "X448:X25519"}], 
  240:                                        [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  241:     
  242:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  243:   
  244: 
  245:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  246:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  247:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  248:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  249:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  250:                                                 [false, no_reply]}},
  251:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts}]),
  252:     %% Wait for session ticket
  253:     ct:sleep(100),
  254: 
  255:     %% Close previous connection as s_server can only handle one at a time
  256:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  257: 
  258:     %% Use ticket
  259:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  260:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  261:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  262:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  263:                                                 [true, no_reply]}},
  264:                                          {from, self()},
  265:                                          {options, ClientOpts}]),
  266:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  267:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
  268: 
  269: openssl_client_hrr() ->
  270:     [{doc,"Test session resumption with session tickets and hello_retry_request (openssl client - erlang server)"}].
  271: openssl_client_hrr(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  272:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  273:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  274:     {_, ServerNode, _Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  275:     TicketFile0 = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "session_ticket0"]),
  276:     TicketFile1 = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "session_ticket1"]),
  277:     ServerTicketMode = proplists:get_value(server_ticket_mode, Config),
  278: 
  279:     Data = "Hello world",
  280: 
  281:     %% Configure session tickets
  282:     ServerOpts = [{session_tickets, ServerTicketMode},
  283:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
  284:                   {supported_groups,[x448, x25519]}|
  285:                   proplists:delete(versions, ServerOpts0)],
  286: 
  287:     Server0 =
  288: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  289: 				   {from, self()},
  290: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  291:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
  292:                                           [false]}},
  293: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  294: 
  295:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
  296:     
  297: 
  298:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client(openssl, [{port, Port0}, 
  299:                                                   {options, ClientOpts},
  300:                                                   {groups,  "P-256:X25519"},
  301:                                                   {session_args, ["-sess_out", TicketFile0]}], Config),
  302: 
  303:     ssl_test_lib:send(Client0, Data),
  304: 
  305:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok),
  306: 
  307:     Server0 ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  308:                               verify_active_session_resumption,
  309:                               [true]}}},
  310: 
  311:     %% Wait for session ticket
  312:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  313:     ct:sleep(100),
  314: 
  315:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client(openssl, [{port, Port0}, 
  316:                                                   {options, ClientOpts},
  317:                                                   {groups,  "P-256:X25519"},
  318:                                                   {session_args, ["-sess_in", TicketFile0,
  319:                                                                   "-sess_out", TicketFile1]}], Config),
  320:     ssl_test_lib:send(Client1, Data),
  321: 
  322:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok),
  323: 
  324:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0),
  325:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
  326: 
  327: openssl_server_hrr_multiple_tickets() ->
  328:     [{doc,"Test session resumption with multiple session tickets and hello_retry_request "
  329:       "(erlang client - openssl server)"}].
  330: openssl_server_hrr_multiple_tickets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  331:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  332:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  333:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  334:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  335: 
  336:     %% Configure session tickets
  337:     ClientOpts = [{session_tickets, manual},
  338:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
  339:                   {supported_groups,[secp256r1, x25519]}|
  340:                   proplists:delete(versions, ClientOpts0)],
  341: 
  342: 
  343:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [{groups, "X448:X25519"}], 
  344:                                        [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  345:     
  346:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  347: 
  348:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  349:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  350:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  351:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  352:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  353:                                                 [false, no_reply, {tickets, 2}]}},
  354:                                          {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts}]),
  355: 
  356:     Tickets0 = ssl_test_lib:check_tickets(Client0),
  357: 
  358:     ?CT_LOG("Received tickets: ~p~n", [Tickets0]),
  359: 
  360:     %% Close previous connection as s_server can only handle one at a time
  361:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  362: 
  363:     %% Use tickets
  364:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  365:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  366:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  367:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  368:                                                 [true, no_reply, no_tickets]}},
  369:                                          {from, self()},
  370:                                          {options, [{use_ticket, Tickets0}|ClientOpts]}]),
  371: 
  372:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  373: 
  374:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  375:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
  376: 
  377: openssl_server_early_data_basic() ->
  378:     [{doc,"Test early data (erlang client - openssl server)"}].
  379: openssl_server_early_data_basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  380:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  381:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  382:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  383: 
  384:     %% Configure session tickets
  385:     ClientOpts1 = [{session_tickets, auto},
  386:                    {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|
  387:                    proplists:delete(versions, ClientOpts0)],
  388:     ClientOpts2 = [{early_data, <<"SampleData">>}|ClientOpts1],
  389: 
  390:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [{early_data, 16384}],
  391:                                        [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  392: 
  393:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  394: 
  395:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  396:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  397:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  398:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  399:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  400:                                                 [false, no_reply]}},
  401:                                          {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts1}]),
  402:     %% Wait for session ticket
  403:     ct:sleep(100),
  404: 
  405:     %% Close previous connection as s_server can only handle one at a time
  406:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  407: 
  408:     %% Use ticket
  409:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  410:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  411:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  412:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  413:                                                 [true, no_reply, no_tickets,
  414:                                                  {verify_early_data, accepted}]}},
  415:                                          {from, self()},
  416:                                          {options, ClientOpts2}]),
  417:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  418:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
  419: 
  420: openssl_server_early_data_big() ->
  421:     [{doc,"Send more early data than the max_early_data_size (erlang client - openssl server)"}].
  422: openssl_server_early_data_big(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  423:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  424:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  425:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  426: 
  427:     %% Configure session tickets
  428:     ClientOpts1 = [{session_tickets, auto},
  429:                    {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|
  430:                    proplists:delete(versions, ClientOpts0)],
  431:     ClientOpts2 = [{early_data, <<"SampleData">>}|ClientOpts1],
  432: 
  433:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [{early_data, 5}],
  434:                                        [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  435: 
  436:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  437: 
  438:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  439:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  440:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  441:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  442:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  443:                                                 [false, no_reply]}},
  444:                                          {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts1}]),
  445:     %% Wait for session ticket
  446:     ct:sleep(100),
  447: 
  448:     %% Close previous connection as s_server can only handle one at a time
  449:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  450: 
  451:     %% Use ticket
  452:     %% The tickets received cannot be used for sending more early data than the
  453:     %% max_early_data_size. They are filtered by the automatic ticket handling
  454:     %% mechanism and there will be no session resumption.
  455:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  456:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  457:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  458:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  459:                                                 [false, no_reply, no_tickets]}},
  460:                                          {from, self()},
  461:                                          {options, ClientOpts2}]),
  462:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  463:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
  464: 
  465: openssl_server_early_data_manual() ->
  466:     [{doc,"Test sending early data - manual ticket handling (erlang client - openssl server)"}].
  467: openssl_server_early_data_manual(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  468:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  469:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  470:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  471:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  472: 
  473:     %% Configure session tickets
  474:     ClientOpts1 = [{session_tickets, manual},
  475:                    {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|
  476:                    proplists:delete(versions, ClientOpts0)],
  477:     ClientOpts2 = [{early_data, <<"SampleData">>}|ClientOpts1],
  478: 
  479:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [{early_data, 16384}],
  480:                                        [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  481: 
  482:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  483: 
  484:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  485:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  486:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  487:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  488:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  489:                                                 [false, no_reply, {tickets, 1}]}},
  490:                                          {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts1}]),
  491: 
  492:     Tickets0 = ssl_test_lib:check_tickets(Client0),
  493: 
  494:     ?CT_LOG("Received tickets: ~p~n", [Tickets0]),
  495: 
  496:     %% Close previous connection as s_server can only handle one at a time
  497:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  498: 
  499:     %% Use tickets
  500:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  501:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  502:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  503:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  504:                                                 [true, no_reply, no_tickets,
  505:                                                  {verify_early_data, accepted}]}},
  506:                                          {from, self()},
  507:                                          {options, [{use_ticket, Tickets0}|ClientOpts2]}]),
  508: 
  509:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  510: 
  511:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  512:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
  513: 
  514: openssl_server_early_data_manual_big() ->
  515:     [{doc,"Test sending more early data than the max_early_data_size - manual ticket handling "
  516:       "(erlang client - openssl server)"}].
  517: openssl_server_early_data_manual_big(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  518:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  519:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  520:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  521:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  522: 
  523:     %% Configure session tickets
  524:     ClientOpts1 = [{session_tickets, manual},
  525:                    {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|
  526:                    proplists:delete(versions, ClientOpts0)],
  527:     ClientOpts2 = [{early_data, <<"SampleData">>}|ClientOpts1],
  528: 
  529:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [{early_data, 5}],
  530:                                        [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  531: 
  532:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  533: 
  534:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  535:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  536:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  537:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  538:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  539:                                                 [false, no_reply, {tickets, 1}]}},
  540:                                          {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts1}]),
  541: 
  542:     Tickets0 = ssl_test_lib:check_tickets(Client0),
  543: 
  544:     ?CT_LOG("Received tickets: ~p~n", [Tickets0]),
  545: 
  546:     %% Close previous connection as s_server can only handle one at a time
  547:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  548: 
  549:     %% Use tickets
  550:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode},
  551:                                                {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  552:                                                {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  553:                                                       verify_active_session_resumption,
  554:                                                       [true, no_reply, no_tickets]}},
  555:                                                {from, self()},
  556:                                                {options, [{use_ticket, Tickets0}|ClientOpts2]}]),
  557:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Client1, illegal_parameter),
  558:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  559: 
  560:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  561:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
  562: 
  563: openssl_server_early_data_manual_2_tickets() ->
  564:     [{doc,"Test sending early data - manual ticket handling, 2 tickets (erlang client - openssl server)"}].
  565: openssl_server_early_data_manual_2_tickets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  566:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  567:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  568:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  569:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  570: 
  571:     %% Configure session tickets
  572:     ClientOpts1 = [{session_tickets, manual},
  573:                    {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|
  574:                    proplists:delete(versions, ClientOpts0)],
  575:     ClientOpts2 = [{early_data, <<"SampleData">>}|ClientOpts1],
  576: 
  577:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [{early_data, 16384}],
  578:                                        [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  579: 
  580:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  581: 
  582:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  583:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  584:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  585:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  586:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  587:                                                 [false, no_reply, {tickets, 2}]}},
  588:                                          {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts1}]),
  589: 
  590:     Tickets0 = ssl_test_lib:check_tickets(Client0),
  591: 
  592:     ?CT_LOG("Received tickets: ~p~n", [Tickets0]),
  593: 
  594:     %% Close previous connection as s_server can only handle one at a time
  595:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  596: 
  597:     %% Use tickets
  598:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  599:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  600:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  601:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  602:                                                 [true, no_reply, no_tickets,
  603:                                                  {verify_early_data, accepted}]}},
  604:                                          {from, self()},
  605:                                          {options, [{use_ticket, Tickets0}|ClientOpts2]}]),
  606:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  607: 
  608:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  609:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
  610: 
  611: openssl_server_early_data_manual_2_chacha_tickets() ->
  612:     [{doc,"Test sending early data - manual ticket handling, 2 tickets - chacha (erlang client - openssl server)"}].
  613: openssl_server_early_data_manual_2_chacha_tickets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  614:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  615:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  616:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  617:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  618: 
  619:     %% Configure session tickets
  620:     ClientOpts1 = [{session_tickets, manual},
  621:                    {ciphers, ["TLS_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256"]},
  622:                    {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|
  623:                    proplists:delete(versions, ClientOpts0)],
  624:     ClientOpts2 = [{early_data, <<"SampleData">>}|ClientOpts1],
  625: 
  626:     %% openssl s_server seems to select a cipher_suite that satisfies the requirements
  627:     %% for early_data.
  628:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [{early_data, 16384}],
  629:                                        [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  630: 
  631:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  632: 
  633:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  634:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  635:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  636:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  637:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  638:                                                 [false, no_reply, {tickets, 2}]}},
  639:                                          {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts1}]),
  640: 
  641:     %% Receive 2 tickets that used Chacha20-Poly1305 and sha256
  642:     Tickets0 = ssl_test_lib:check_tickets(Client0),
  643: 
  644:     ?CT_LOG("Received tickets: ~p~n", [Tickets0]),
  645: 
  646:     %% Close previous connection as s_server can only handle one at a time
  647:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  648: 
  649:     %% Use tickets
  650:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  651:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  652:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  653:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  654:                                                 [true, no_reply, no_tickets,
  655:                                                  {verify_early_data, accepted}]}},
  656:                                          {from, self()},
  657:                                          {options, [{use_ticket, Tickets0}|ClientOpts2]}]),
  658:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  659: 
  660:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  661:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
  662: 
  663: openssl_client_early_data_basic() ->
  664:     [{doc,"Test early data (openssl client - erlang server)"}].
  665: openssl_client_early_data_basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  666:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  667:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  668: 
  669:     {_, ServerNode, _Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  670:     TicketFile0 = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "session_ticket0"]),
  671:     TicketFile1 = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "session_ticket1"]),
  672:     RequestFile = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "request"]),
  673:     ServerTicketMode = proplists:get_value(server_ticket_mode, Config),
  674:     %% Create request file to be used with early data
  675:     EarlyData = <<"HEAD / HTTP/1.1\nHost: \nConnection: close\n\n", 0, 0>>,
  676:     create_request(RequestFile, EarlyData),
  677: 
  678:     %% Configure session tickets
  679:     ServerOpts = [{session_tickets, ServerTicketMode},
  680:                   {early_data, enabled},
  681:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|
  682:                   proplists:delete(versions, ServerOpts0)],
  683: 
  684:     Server0 =
  685: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  686: 				   {from, self()},
  687: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  688:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
  689:                                           [false]}},
  690: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  691: 
  692:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
  693: 
  694:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client(openssl, [{port, Port0},
  695:                                                   {options, ClientOpts},
  696:                                                   {session_args, ["-sess_out", TicketFile0]}], Config),
  697:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok),
  698: 
  699:     Server0 ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  700:                               verify_server_early_data,
  701:                               [wait_reply, EarlyData]}}},
  702: 
  703:     %% %% Wait for session ticket
  704:     ct:sleep(100),
  705:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  706: 
  707:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client(openssl, [{port, Port0},
  708:                                                   {options, ClientOpts},
  709:                                                   {session_args, ["-sess_in", TicketFile0,
  710:                                                                   "-sess_out", TicketFile1,
  711:                                                                   "-early_data", RequestFile]}],
  712:                                         Config),
  713: 
  714:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok),
  715:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0),
  716:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
  717: 
  718: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  719: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
  720: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  721: 
  722: create_request(File, EarlyData) ->
  723:     {ok, S} = file:open(File, [write]),
  724:     io:format(S, "~s", [binary_to_list(EarlyData)]),
  725:     file:close(S).
  726:
